snippet.title: Super Multitasking GO! Official Trailer
snippet.description:
yyrgames.com - How many games can you play at once? Unlock your hidden potential with Super Multitasking GO! It's a special FREE version of Super Duper Multitasking!

Using an intuitive control scheme and your amazing gaming skills, you'll soon be playing up to 4 minigames at a time! Discover how far you can go, wow your streaming audience, and compete with players around the world!

This infinitely-replayable workout for your brain is full of options and surprises! It's great at parties, for warming up before long gaming sessions, or for pushing yourself to your limits! Your streaming audience will cheer you on and celebrate when you clear tough Missions or set new personal bests! Experience it with your friends for a night of screams, shouts, and cheers! It's wild, unpredictable, and a ton of fun...it's Super Multitasking GO!

This unique experience is absolutely FREE! And, if you love it, and want a whole lot more, check out Super Duper Multitasking!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/3151600/Super_Multitasking_GO/
